mapper.select: SELECT RC.RECRUIT_CV_NO, RC.RECRUIT_CV_EDU, RC.RECRUIT_CV_CAREER, RC.RECRUIT_CV_PDF_TITLE, RC.RECRUIT_CV_DATE, RC.RECRUIT_CV_CHECK_FL, RC.MEM_NO, RC.RECRUIT_NO, R.RECRUIT_TITLE FROM RECRUIT_CV RC JOIN RECRUIT R ON RC.RECRUIT_NO = R.RECRUIT_NO WHERE RC.RECRUIT_NO = #{recruitNo} ORDER BY RC.RECRUIT_CV_NO DESC
SELECT RECRUIT_CV_PDF_PATH FROM RECRUIT_CV WHERE RECRUIT_CV_NO = #{cvNo}
